title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When I press 'Finish' on the JAR packager wizard, I receive the following error message: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.
OB: I am not able to save the files before creating the JAR. Additionally, if I try to save manually by quitting the wizard, saving, and then reopening the wizard, I have to enter all the fields again.
EB: I should be allowed to create a JAR even with unsaved editors. If the editors are unsaved, there should be a dialog prompting me to save them before proceeding with the JAR creation.
SR:
1. Open the JAR packager wizard
2. Add some files to the package
3. Leave the files unsaved
4. Click on 'Finish' to create the JAR
5. Observe the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'
